alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 1:53PM EST until February 22 at 8:41PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Raccoon Creek near Granville. Mill Creek at Evendale. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mill Creek at Evendale. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Lowland flooding of the Mill Creek floodplain occurs with water approaching some buildings along the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest just above 12 feet this afternoon by 3pm. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
